import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import LoginForm from'./LoginForm';import BandLyricsSync from'./BandLyricsSync';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function AuthWrapper(){const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{// Check if user is already logged in
